projects.title: NLP to SQL Query Interface
projects.description: A modern web application that converts natural language queries into SQL using AI, with interactive data visualization and multi-database support.
features: Natural language to SQL query conversion using Google Gemini AI
Interactive data visualization with AI-powered smart chart suggestions
Support for multiple database types including MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB
User-friendly interface with tab-based layout, collapsible sidebar, and schema explorer
Comprehensive query management including history, saved queries, and suggested patterns
Google OAuth authentication with secure session management
Data export capabilities (CSV, Excel) and interactive table features like search and sorting
projects.longDescription: A modern web application that converts natural language queries into SQL using Google Gemini AI, offering interactive data visualization and multi-database support. It provides intelligent query understanding, AI-powered chart suggestions, and a user-friendly interface for database interaction, authentication, and data management.

projects.title: GiGy - Simplified Freelance Platform
projects.description: A minimalist freelance marketplace with real-time chat, gig posting, and seamless user experience.
features: User registration and authentication with JWT.
Gig posting, assignment, and completion flow.
Applications and reviews for gigs.
Real-time chat with Socket.IO and room-based logic.
Profile management with image uploads via Cloudinary.
Secure REST API endpoints with token-based auth.
Production deployment with NGINX and PM2 on Azure.
challenges: üí¨ Real-Time Chat: Implementing room-based logic and handling socket disconnections/reconnections.
üîë Authentication: Secure handling of token expiration during API requests.
üì∑ File Uploads: Syncing Cloudinary uploads with MongoDB document updates.
‚öôÔ∏è Deployment: Configuring NGINX reverse proxy, SSL certificates, and PM2 process management.
‚ö° Performance: Stress-testing endpoints with K6 and debugging MongoDB query performance.

projects.title: RAG PDF Summarizer
projects.description: AI-powered application that summarizes PDF documents using RAG architecture
features: Upload and process PDF documents of any size.
Extract text and create vector embeddings for efficient retrieval.
Generate accurate summaries using RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation).
Interactive chat interface to ask questions about the document.
Support for multiple file formats and batch processing.
challenges: üîç Text Extraction: Handling complex PDF layouts, tables, and mixed content while maintaining context and structure.
‚ö° Vector Storage: Implementing efficient vector database for large documents and optimizing retrieval speed.
üß† RAG Pipeline: Fine-tuning the retrieval mechanism to fetch most relevant chunks for accurate summarization.
üíæ Memory Management: Handling large documents without overwhelming system resources during processing.

projects.title: Nearby Places
projects.description: Web app to find nearby places using Google Maps API and Flask
features: Listings of rental properties with images and descriptions.
Integration with map services to show nearby places.
Route visualization to selected properties.
User-friendly, responsive design.
challenges: üìç Accurate Mapping: Integrating location APIs and ensuring accurate geolocation data was tricky.
üß≠ Route Optimization: Implementing route visualizations dynamically depending on user location required handling real-time geolocation.
üîç Filtering Nearby Places: Filtering and displaying only relevant nearby places without cluttering the map UI took careful design planning.

projects.title: Fee Tracking System
projects.description: Web application for tracking fees and payments using React and Django
features: Add/view/update student records.
Toggle fee status (Paid/Unpaid).
Visualize data using bar graphs and pie charts.
Export filtered records (paid/unpaid) to Excel sheets.
challenges: üìà Dynamic Graph Generation: Creating real-time visual graphs using Matplotlib and Seaborn based on database changes.
üì§ Excel Export: Automating data export with filters (only paid/unpaid) and formatting it in a readable way.
üíæ Data Management: Managing a clean and searchable student database that scales well with large entries.

projects.title: Travel Assistant Chatbot
projects.description: Chatbot for travel assistance using Python and Flask
features: Intelligent chatbot that understands natural queries.
Suggests must-visit places, foods, and custom itineraries.
Provides travel tips and local customs.
Easy integration into websites or apps.
challenges: üß† AI Response Quality: Training/using the AI to provide contextually accurate and culturally relevant travel recommendations.
üåç Dynamic Recommendations: Ensuring recommendations are tailored to the user's preferences and location.
üîå Integration: Embedding the chatbot into the UI without affecting performance or responsiveness.
